item.title: It’s been a while
item.dc:creator: Brandon
item.description: I think the last post I did talked about how we were going to get so much done this summer and how active we were going to be. Oy, I overestimated our ability to juggle responsibilities ;). We did work on a lot, but I also feel like development slowed quite a bit, perhaps because […]

item.title: Wow!
item.dc:creator: Brandon
item.description: So we are as of now featured on the Android Market! It’s been a crazy weekend, mostly because it’s a lot to take in. I mean don’t get us wrong, this has been what we’ve been hoping for for months now, but it’s just crazy. We always see all the apps that get featured and […]

item.title: Summer!!!!!!
item.dc:creator: Brandon
item.description: So class is finally over. Several people I know graduated and so spent the weekend at various graduation parties and whatnot, been fun :). Now though, time to get back to business, Zach has been putting a lot of work into Refraction the past couple weeks and it’s really looking good for the 1.5 release, […]

item.title: Review of Refraction on The App Informer
item.dc:creator: Brandon
item.description: We just received a stellar review over on TheAppInformer.com! We had been in contact via email with them for several days which is fun to be able to keep in touch with players of our game, but then to now see a review of our game online, it’s awesome! Head over to TheAppInformer.com and look […]
